package.name: PEAR_PackageUpdate_Web
package.summary: A Web front end for PEAR_PackageUpdate
package.description:
PEAR_PackageUpdate (PPU) is designed to allow developers to easily include auto updating features for other packages and PEAR installable applications.
PEAR_PackageUpdate_Web is a HTML web front end for PPU.

release.notes:

* qa - pear installer dependency is 1.4.8 same as for PPU

PPU and its frontend have a website: please visit http://pear.laurent-laville.org/PEAR_PackageUpdate
